processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Think about what must happen inside the loop: how to detect a divisor and how to update the running total.
Refine the loop into control steps: iterate candidate numbers, use a selection to check divisibility (remainder zero), and accumulate divisors into sum.
Write sub-comments under the loop: (1) for each i from 1 to n, (2) if i divides n then add i to sum, (3) after the loop print sum; then implement those comments in code.
